title: Okoška Gora
text: Okoška Gora () is a settlement in the <a href="Municipality%20of%20Oplotnica">Municipality of Oplotnica</a> in eastern <a href="Slovenia">Slovenia</a>. It lies on the southern slopes of the <a href="Pohorje">Pohorje</a> range east of Oplotnica. The area is part of the traditional region of <a href="Lower%20Styria">Styria</a> and is now included in the <a href="Drava%20Statistical%20Region">Drava Statistical Region</a>.
